verses.verse: Paul <WG3972>, an apostle <WG652> of Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> through <WG1223> the will <WG2307> of God <WG2316>, according to <WG2596> the promise <WG1860> of the life <WG2222> which is <WG3588> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>,

to Timothy <WG5095>, my beloved <WG27> child <WG5043>: Grace <WG5485>, mercy <WG1656>, peace <WG1515>, from <WG575> God <WG2316> the Father <WG3962> and <WG2532> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962>.

I <WG2192> thank <WG5485> God <WG2316>, whom <WG3739> I serve <WG3000> from <WG575> my forefathers <WG4269> in <WG1722> a pure <WG2513> conscience <WG4893>, how <WG5613> unceasing <WG88> is my <WG2192> remembrance <WG3417> of <WG4012> thee <WG4675> in <WG1722> my <WG3450> supplications <WG1162>, night <WG3571> and <WG2532> day <WG2250>
longing <WG1971> to see <WG1492> thee <WG4571>, remembering <WG3415> thy <WG4675> tears <WG1144>, that <WG2443> I may be filled <WG4137> with joy <WG5479>;

having been <WG2983> reminded <WG5280> of the unfeigned <WG505> faith <WG4102> that is <WG3588> in <WG1722> thee <WG4671>; which <WG3748> dwelt <WG1774> first <WG4412> in <WG1722> thy <WG4675> grandmother <WG3125> Lois <WG3090>, and <WG2532> thy <WG4675> mother <WG3384> Eunice <WG2131>; and <WG1161>, I am persuaded <WG3982>, <WG3754> in <WG1722> thee <WG4671> also <WG2532>.

For which <WG1223> cause I put <WG363> thee <WG4571> in remembrance <WG363> that thou stir up <WG329> the gift <WG5486> of God <WG2316>, which <WG3739> is <WG2076> in <WG1722> thee <WG4671> through <WG1223> the laying on <WG1936> of my <WG3450> hands <WG156>.
For <WG1063> God <WG2316> gave <WG1325> us2254, 1325 not <WG3756> a spirit <WG4151> of fearfulness <WG1167>; but <WG235> of power <WG1411> and <WG2532> love <WG26> and <WG2532> discipline <WG4995>.

Be <WG1870> not <WG3361> ashamed therefore <WG3767> of <WG1870> the testimony <WG3142> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962>, nor <WG3366> of me <WG1691> his <WG846> prisoner <WG1198>: but <WG235> suffer hardship <WG4777> with the gospel <WG2098> according to <WG2596> the power <WG1411> of God <WG2316>;

who saved <WG4982> us <WG2248>, and <WG2532> called <WG2564> us with a holy <WG40> calling <WG2821>, not <WG3756> according to <WG2596> our <WG2257> works <WG2041>, but <WG235> according to <WG2596> his own <WG2398> purpose <WG4286> and <WG2532> grace <WG5485>, which was given <WG1325> us <WG2254> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> before <WG4253> times <WG166> eternal <WG5550>,

but <WG1161> hath <WG5319> now <WG3568> been manifested <WG5319> by <WG1223> the appearing <WG2015> of our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>, who abolished <WG2673> death <WG2288>, and <WG1161> brought <WG5461> life <WG2222> and <WG2532> immortality <WG861> to light <WG5461> through <WG1223> the gospel <WG2098>,
whereunto3739, 1519 I <WG1473> was appointed <WG5087> a preacher <WG2783>, and <WG2532> an apostle <WG652>, and <WG2532> a teacher <WG1320>.

For <WG1223> which <WG3739> cause I <WG3958> suffer also <WG2532> these things <WG5023>: yet <WG235> I am <WG1870> not <WG3756> ashamed <WG1870>; for <WG1063> I know <WG1492> him whom <WG3739> I have believed <WG4100>, and <WG2532> I am persuaded <WG3982> that <WG3754> he is <WG2076> able <WG1415> to guard <WG5442> that which <WG3866> I <WG3450> have committed <WG3866> unto him against <WG1519> that <WG1565> day <WG156>.

Hold <WG2192> the pattern <WG5296> of sound <WG5198> words <WG3056> which <WG3739> thou hast heard <WG191> from <WG3844> me <WG1700>, in <WG1722> faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> love <WG26> which is <WG3588> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.
That <WG3588> good thing <WG2570> which was committed unto thee <WG3872> guard <WG5442> through <WG1223> the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> which dwelleth <WG1774> in <WG1722> us <WG2254>.

This <WG5124> thou knowest <WG1492>, that <WG3754> all <WG3956> that are <WG3588> in <WG1722> Asia <WG773> turned away from <WG654> me <WG3165>; of whom <WG3739> are <WG2076> Phygelus <WG5436> and <WG2532> Hermogenes <WG2061>.

The Lord <WG2962> grant <WG1325> mercy <WG1656> unto the house <WG3624> of Onesiphorus <WG3683>: for <WG3754> he <WG404> oft <WG4178> refreshed <WG404> me <WG3165>, and <WG2532> was <WG1870> not <WG3756> ashamed <WG1870> of my <WG3450> chain <WG254>;
but <WG235>, when he was <WG1096> in <WG1722> Rome <WG4516>, he sought <WG2212> me <WG3165> diligently <WG4706>, and <WG2532> found <WG2147> me <WG3165>

(the Lord <WG2962> grant <WG1325> unto him <WG846> to find <WG2147> mercy <WG1656> of <WG3844> the Lord <WG2962> in <WG1722> that <WG1565> day <WG2250>); and <WG2532> in how many things <WG3745> he ministered <WG1247> at <WG1722> Ephesus <WG2181>, thou <WG4771> knowest <WG1097> very well <WG957>.
